availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. H. Robertson (Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William M. Robertson and Martha Robertson. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Marshall County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 280B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 852.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #18994.
